duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete on-the-job training in various areas including warehouse, counter sales, accounts payable, accounts receivable, financial statements, purchasing, account management, project management, inventory management, and business development.
Attend multiple training sessions focused on electrical products, sales, and management.
Engage in online training related to electrical systems, sales, and management.
Possess outstanding communication skills and thrive in a fast-paced, multi-faceted industry.
Relocate as required during and upon completion of the program.
Demonstrate strong leadership and negotiation skills in the role.
